why_this_matters: Optimal team structures follow fibonacci numbers. Communication flows in spirals. Meeting efficiency peaks at golden ratio intervals.
scrape_method: Organizational psychology + team performance data + mathematical modeling + agile methodology research
raw_data_snippet: Team sizes: 1 leader, 3 core members, 5 specialists, 8 contributors. Meeting rhythm: 25min focused + 15min buffer (golden ratio). Standup spiral: update→question→commitment
replication_instruction: Structure teams in fibonacci numbers, organize communication in spiral patterns, time meetings using golden ratio, delegate in recursive layers
